resources.string:
This software has been created by Skyost by using some libraries : AppIntro v4.1.0, Android-Rate v1.0.1, WeekView (by Quivr) v2.0.2 and iCal4j v2.0.0. 

You can check the source code of this software on Github.

The software and its source code are available under GNU GPL v3.

Disclaimer :
This application has not been developed by any official member of the University. Consequently, do not send any request to the establishment if you have a problem with this application.
Furthermore, this application needs your student number with your password to work. Your credentials will not be send to any third party, except to the University server in order to download your timetable.
If you do not trust this application, you can still check the source code with the "Github" link below.
Check your timetable on your smartphone : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.skyost.timetable.
This application allows the students of the University of Caen Normandie to check their timetable directly on their smartphone.
We need to an internet access to download your timable !
Don\'t worry ! Your credentials will not be send to any third party and will be used only to download your timetable from the Unicaen servers.
We need to access to your Unicaen account…
You are ready. Touch the button below to begin.

And welcome to your timetable !

Please tap on the top button to check your timetable or to configure the application.

Press the bottom button to refresh your timetable.

Updated your timetable for the last time : %s.
(an update is required or you are in holidays)
Don\'t forget that you can pinch to zoom or tap on a lesson to see more informations !
Bad username or password. Redirecting you to the login screen…
Unable to load your timetable from the disk !
Unable to save your timetable on the disk !
We do not have the permission to create an alarm !
